properties.senderName: NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued March 1 at 5:52PM MST by NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.description:
THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS
DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY.

THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT
NETWORK.

THE MESQUITE POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR NYLA CROCKETT, BLACK,
FEMALE, 8 MONTHS OLD, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES.

POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR CHENARIO CROCKETT, BLACK, FEMALE, 30 YEARS
OLD, 5 FEET 6 INCHES TALL, 172 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES AND
WEARING A GRAY SHIRT, BLUE JEANS, WITH BROWN OR BLACK BOOTS, IN
CONNECTION WITH HER ABDUCTION.

LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR
IMMEDIATE DANGER.

IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE
MESQUITE POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 972-216-6241.

NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS MESQUITE POLICE DEPARTMENT AT
972-216-6241.
